document_data.name: Llewan Aspenwold
document_data.deathnotes: Died in the [[House of Mystra]]'s destruction by blue fire
document_data.mainbody: '''Llewan Aspenwold''' was a [[priestess]] of [[Mystra]] in the [[Harrowdale]] region of [[the Dalelands]] around the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Llewan had a great fascination with magic tricks{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Prospect|18}}
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Llewan opened the [[House of Mystra]] in Harrowdale. However, she made very few converts and most Dalesfolk simply ignored her. Llewan wondered to do something great to arrite attention.

In the {{YearlinkName|1385}}, Llewan died within her temple as it was destroyed by the blue fires of the [[Spellplague]]. Her temple would go on to be left abandoned,{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Prospect|35-36}} leaving the restless spirit of Llewan to haunt it as a [[ghost]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Prospect|17}}
